channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IL

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found when unloading a van. Package was wet and leaking. Package was removed from operation area and taken to Hazmat Cage for processing. Any spill was cleaned up and materials used were brought to Hazmat cage. DescribePack: loose caps and seals on inner bottles DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: As soon as package was discovered leaking it was removed from the area and taken to Hazmat cage.

item.title: Report I-2023090115
item.description:
Report I-2023090115

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-13T00:34:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-19
  • City: WILLOW SPRINGS
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNIVAR SOLUTIONS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During the evening of 05/19/2023 a drum of ChemCare waste pickup that afternoon from Henkel in Elgin, IL was found to be leaking on the pickup trailer upon check in. One drum of waste profile 75-13800 was overpack once leak was discovered. Approximately two gallons of material appeared to have been released. Spill contained to within trailer and direct below trailer on concrete pad at the loading dock. Spill was cleanup properly by operators upon discovery. No exposure to employees, no impact to sewer or waterways.
